about_the_game: IDIOTIC is a fast-paced singleplayer FPS where you can switch between alternate dimensions at will. Wreak chaos and improve your character as you move at break-neck speed.
detailed_description: IDIOTIC is a fast-paced singleplayer FPS where you can switch between alternate dimensions at will. Wreak chaos and improve your character as you move at break-neck speed.
name: Idiotic The Game Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: windows 7
  • Processor: i7-10510U
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 630
  • Sound Card: ASUS SonicMaster stereo
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: IDIOTIC is a fast-paced singleplayer FPS where you can switch between alternate dimensions at will. Wreak chaos and improve your character as you move at break-neck speed.
